title: Riven is Trash and need buffed.
body:
She can't Duel tanks
She's melee
No defense
She can't assassinate anyone because her gapclosers aren't instant and anyone who can get 3 basic attacks with more than 2 items kills her
Shitty lane sustain



If she isn't durable and she isn't an assassin. what the fuck does she do that is so apparently overpowered?

"Hurr Durr she 1 v 5 instagibs teams" E in get blown up before your second Q. Don't E in get poked down before you even engage. Sneak in while your team gets hammered, and die instantly to AoE.....
